summary:
I just finished Captain Marvel, so, here's an idea:
What if all cats are Flerkens? And they see humans as little creatures below...
body:
I just finished Captain Marvel, so, here’s an idea:

What if all cats are Flerkens? And they see humans as little creatures below them that wouldn’t dare attempt to hurt them. So they begin to infest Earth and suddenly they get all this love and attention from these humans who are harmless. It’s not until a new, more dangerous species shows up that the Flerken will show their true nature.

reblog.comment:

summary: Just saw Captain Marvel. I thought it was really good and I had a nice time watching it. Definitely glad I saw it myself instead...
body:
Just saw Captain Marvel. I thought it was really good and I had a nice time watching it. Definitely glad I saw it myself instead of listening to the arguments on here and Youtube.

It had its flaws like pretty much any superhero movie, but I really enjoyed the characters and even though I suspected the twist, I liked the direction it took.

Not my top top MCU movie but defiantly had fun and it’s a great way to kick off this year for superhero movies! I totally want to see more of Carol and GOOSE!!! Definitely deserves a 7.5/10 from me 😁😁😁

reblog.comment:

summary: So I have a somewhat irrational fear that Thanos is going to bring back the dead Avengers to make them fight the others.
body:
So I have a somewhat irrational fear that Thanos is going to bring back the dead Avengers to make them fight the others.

In a post made by starkravinghazelnuts, they pointed out that the newest Endgame posters have sixteen alive Avengers and sixteen dead Avengers and that the colors in the trailers are red and black like the colors of old chess sets. There are sixteen pieces for each color.

Sixteen alive = red

Sixteen dead = black

Marvel said that Endgame is going to cause heartbreak for the living Avengers. What if that’s because they have to fight their friends (maybe even kill them)? And they time travel to both erase what they’ve had to do and reverse what’s happened to the earth?

I’m just thinking out loud, so please don’t think I’m right because this is probably wrong. But thanks for reading!
